name: Super Sportsball
description:
Super Sportsball is an imaginary sport(s) simulator where your players' personalities and relationships determine how well they do on the field! You may link players to have them buff each others' passing, shooting, and defending, but if one of them dies, as they may, you may have to change up your playstyle with the new member!

Instructions:

Before a game starts, press the number keys to swap the players into different spaces (2 is Defense, where players with high Cool will block the ball from entering the goal)

During the game, press the number keys to Link players, which buffs them both according to their Constructive

Combative is used to score and to attack the enemy
